snippet: The Hall of Fame jockey Gary Stevens rode his 5,000th winner in North America in a $58,000 feature at the Santa Anita track in Arcadia, Calif.
abstract: Hall of Fame jockey Gary Stevens guides Catch a Flight to neck victory at Santa Anita to take his 5,000th winner in North America.
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame jockey Gary Stevens rode his 5,000th winner in North America in a $58,000 feature at the Santa Anita track in Arcadia, Calif.
